title: Aristocrat Events
description: Aristocrat's information source for Trade Shows and Events.
descriptionHTML: Aristocrat's information source for Trade Shows and Events.
summary: Mobile Event Guide for Aristocrat Events
recentChanges:
-For your security, we increased the lockout time for failed login attempts.

-Bug fixes and enhancements to improve the overall attendee app experience.

title: Tito Check-in
description:
The Tito Check-in app allows you to log in to your Tito account to download attendee lists for on-site check-in. 
You can also share the app with volunteers, who can download the list without a login via a QR code. 
Attendees can be checked in manually, or by scanning the QR code on tickets issued by Tito.
descriptionHTML:
The Tito Check-in app allows you to log in to your Tito account to download attendee lists for on-site check-in.
You can also share the app with volunteers, who can download the list without a login via a QR code.
Attendees can be checked in manually, or by scanning the QR code on tickets issued by Tito.
summary: Tito Check-in App for on-site check-in at events.

Amazing

title: SlimeFest 2020
description:
Welcome to the official 2020 Nickelodeon SlimeFest app, your mobile guide to having the SLIME of your life at this year’s festival.
 
With the SlimeFest app, you’ll have the most up to date festival information right at your fingertips:
- Access exclusive ticket and add-on offers
- Buy exclusive SlimeFest merch before it sells out
- See the full lineup and brush up on your favorite artists like JoJo Siwa and Why Don’t We, plus get to know new talent like Darci Lynne
- Keep track of your “must-do” activities, explore the festival map to help plan and maximize your time, check out photos from last year, get answers to your questions, see travel options, learn about our festival partners, and SO much more!
 
Don’t forget to turn your push notifications on, so you don’t miss any real-time festival updates.
 
SlimeFest is Nickelodeon’s event of the year you don’t want to miss. A day of music, slime and endless entertainment for the whole family. LIVE at the Forum in LA March 21 and 22, 2020.  Buy your tickets if you haven’t already and download the app today!
 
And for more info, visit us at nickslimefest.com or follow us on Instagram @nickslimefest.
 


Nickelodeon SlimeFest collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data) and connects with 3rd party social media applications. User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Apple, Inc., and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Apple's collection or use of your personal user data and information.
 
Additionally, this App may use “local notifications.” Local notifications are sent directly from the App to your device (you don’t need to be connected to the Internet) and may be used to notify you of new content or events within your App, among other reasons. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement.
 
SlimeFest may contain in-app advertising.
 
For users residing in the EU, SlimeFest may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.
End User License Agreement: http://www.nick.com/nick-eula/
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.experiencesbynick.com/index.php?cID=633

The End User License Agreement for this app includes arbitration for disputes – see FAQs: http://www.nick.com/faqs/

title: رسائل عيد الأم 2020
description:
فى عيد الام يحتفل العالم بموعد عيد الام لعام 2020، فكلنا نعلم تمام اهمية الام فى حياتنا جميعا ، وان كافة الاشخاص بدون ام لا يسوون شئ بدونها فيارب بارك لنا فى اعمار امهاتنا واجعل لهم جنات الفردوس يارب العالمين ، فكل عام وكل ام بخير وسلام ، فاليوم نعرض لكم مجموعة رائعة من الرسائل لتهنية عيد الام 2020، ومش بس كده بحثنا وقمنا بتجميع افضل الصور الخاصة بعيد الام للتهنئة ايضاُ ولتهديها لكافة الامهات فى العالم لتهنئهم بعيدهم، وسنضع لكم كلام لعيد الام و اجمل الصور عن عيد الام ومجموعة بوستات عيد الام واجمل ما قيل في عيد الام لعام 2020 وحالات عن عيد ميلاد الام 2020 للواتس وفايبر وكافة البرامج ومش هننسي مسجات عيد ميلاد الام ونص كلام عن الام فيس بوك لعام سعيد لها 2020.

المميزات:
✔ مجموعة من رسائل عيد الأم في تطبيق واحد
✓ يمكن إرسال الرسائل بسهولة
✓ يمكن حفظ الرسائل والمسجات في المفضلة
✓ يمكن تغيير الخلفية
✓ يمكن نسخ الرسالة
✓ يمكن أن يعمل بدون انترنت


يمكنك تطبيق رسائل عيد الأم 2020 من كتابة الرسائل التي تعبر عن مشاعرك ثم ارسلها لأمك أو حماتك.
نحن نرحب بإستفساراتكم وإقتراحاتكم لتحسين هذا التطبيق، ونتمنى أن لا تنسوا التقييم لتشجيعنا. وشكراً

✔ مجموعة من رسائل عيد الأم في تطبيق واحد

✓ يمكن نسخ الرسالة
✓ يمكن أن يعمل بدون انترنت


يمكنك تطبيق رسائل عيد الأم 2020 من كتابة الرسائل التي تعبر عن مشاعرك ثم ارسلها لأمك أو حماتك.
نحن نرحب بإستفساراتكم وإقتراحاتكم لتحسين هذا التطبيق، ونتمنى أن لا تنسوا التقييم لتشجيعنا. وشكراً
summary: The most beautiful messages and words of love for Mother's Day 2020

title: JW Event
description:
JW EVENT is an official app produced by Jehovah's Witnesses.  It includes information about International Conventions of Jehovah's Witnesses.

DELEGATES
- View your itinerary.
- Read What's New articles.
- Find answers to your frequently asked questions.

VOLUNTEERS
- View your assignments.
- Read What's New articles.
- Access answers to delegate's frequently asked questions.

© Copyright 2019 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
descriptionHTML:
JW EVENT is an official app produced by Jehovah's Witnesses. It includes information about International Conventions of Jehovah's Witnesses.

DELEGATES
- View your itinerary.
- Read What's New articles.
- Find answers to your frequently asked questions.

VOLUNTEERS
- View your assignments.
- Read What's New articles.
- Access answers to delegate's frequently asked questions.

© Copyright 2019 Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania
summary: View information about International Conventions of Jehovah's Witnesses
recentChanges:
- Additional information for SFTS users
- Bug fixes and stability updates
comments: I love this app so much cause one time I was tempted to post things on Instagram etc and I felt uncomfortable but now I have this app I can post things for people who I know and trust, i also feel more comfortable. It helps me stay spiritual and have a good impact on others.
I really like this app because it helped me to stay spiritual in the meetings instead of not paying attention

I am a delegate in Poland and can not sign in on my android phone. I downloaded it on my tablet, but I don't want to constantly have my tablet while touring the city. On my phone it says I am verified, but I still cannot sign in and I have had it resend the email several times. I even uninstalled and reinstalled. Please help before our touring starts tomorrow.

Excellent and helpful app. Not sure where to file bug reports: home > about > privacy > [go back] > [go back] > it brings you to an unfinished home page that has a block for favourites and is different than the original homepage

l logged out of JW Event and unfortunately l can not sign in again. I followed the instructions but l keep getting an error message saying 'this login link has been used or it has expired. Could please advise what to do. I do have assignments with two different departments and I'm bit anxious not being able to login. Your assistance is greatly appreciated.

title: Indiana Farm Bureau
description:
The Indiana Farm Bureau mobile app provides the convenience of having your membership card, event information and member benefits all in one easy-to-use application.

Whether you’re on vacation and want to book a hotel or looking for the bio on one of our annual state convention speakers, the Indiana Farm Bureau app is designed to be your go-to app for all things Indiana Farm Bureau.
descriptionHTML:
The Indiana Farm Bureau mobile app provides the convenience of having your membership card, event information and member benefits all in one easy-to-use application.

Whether you’re on vacation and want to book a hotel or looking for the bio on one of our annual state convention speakers, the Indiana Farm Bureau app is designed to be your go-to app for all things Indiana Farm Bureau.
summary: The official app of Indiana Farm Bureau
recentChanges:
- My Member Deals – Indiana Farm Bureau’s member benefit platform
- Annual State Convention event information including daily schedule, resources and locations
- Young Farmers & Ag Professionals Conference information including daily schedule, maps and speaker bio’s
- Indiana Farm Bureau membership card

title: WarZone
description: WarZone Brasil na palma da sua mão. Acesse gratuitamente de forma rápida e prática , conteúdos exclusivos e novidades. Você ainda poderá realizar seu check-in no evento e compras de alimentação sem enfrentar filas.
descriptionHTML: WarZone Brasil na palma da sua mão. Acesse gratuitamente de forma rápida e prática , conteúdos exclusivos e novidades. Você ainda poderá realizar seu check-in no evento e compras de alimentação sem enfrentar filas.
summary: App for use by players enrolled in the WZ Brazil event

title: Free PC Games. Show you all free Epic Games, Steam
description:
Free PC Games makes it easy for you to get all the free games. Now it is no longer necessary to constantly search for free games because Free PC Games does that for you. This app will show all free games from Epic Games, Steam, Origin... Nobody likes to miss the opportunity to get a game for free. So download Free PC Games and never miss a free game again!

With Free PC Games you get the following features:

    + All stores combined in one app (e.g. Epic Games, Steam, Origin ...)
    + Notifications of new free games
    + See all incoming free games

The app is constantly being developed!
descriptionHTML:

With Free PC Games you get the following features:

+ All stores combined in one app (e.g. Epic Games, Steam, Origin ...)
+ Notifications of new free games
+ See all incoming free games

The app is constantly being developed!
summary: Free PC Games shows you all free games. You will never miss a free game again!
recentChanges:
+ Crashed reason has been fixed (Android 4.x-6.x)
+ Tablet view is optimized
comments: The app is getting better now. We can see free games not only from epic games store but also on steam. I have no idea if there is another store that can offer some games as well. It would be great that the app could keep us update. The good thing is we get the notifications just in case if we missed to check it. Thanks

Dev is a gamer. App helps me avoid checking epic games store every night in case I miss something! I'm mad about missing subnautica when it was free! Still didn't get to enjoy the notifications I'll wait for the list of available free games to change and see. Thank you.
This has helped me find some great games and what's better they are free. Only comment is that it wouldn't open steam app on my phone. Great idea!
Amazing app, does exactly what it says , lucky i stumbled upon this app, great work and keep it up.
App is great except i get this bug on samsug galaxy s8 when I try to scroll up my home page it refreshes even when I'm not on top of the page

title: Pets Mod - Animal Mods and Addons
description:
This app allowed you to download and install fully functional Animals mod for Minecraft Pocket Edition in one click!

Please check inside this app for more information about this mod such as how to play, guides, screenshots, and many 
This application includes not one mod with Pets, and a selection of the most popular mods and addons for mcpe.
- Each mod and addon are installed very simply. Just click Install and then run Minecraft with a ready-to-play addon and mod
- Before installing, you can get acquainted with the mod or addons by means of screenshots and descriptions.
- In addition to Pets Mod mods and addons you will find a lot of interesting

With this app you can explore an incredible collection of the best addons, mods packs for your Minecraft PE. You will always have the best mods and addons available for Minecraft PE. This app contains hundreds of textures with photos and descriptions.

Add number of new animal species, from big to small, into using this mod. What you going to get is a more diverse animal world insects, fishes, birds and more. Every biome will be more populated - and thats mean more food. Of course, more animals to come soon and you can combine this mod with another one of the same kind because this mod wont affect any existing entities.
Animals like: deers, flamingo, goats, bees, worms , mines , wolfs, foxes and other.

Features:

- Images and description of each addon/mod
- Tons of Minecraft Mods and Addons Packs
- Easy to download and install
- Compatible with Tablets & Smartphones
- Instruction guide of how to play

This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines.

title: Mutant Mod - Zombie Addons and Mods
description:
New feature of mcpe is called minecraft addon, Using mcpe addons you can modify behaviors properties of any mobs, create and modify of new worlds and change all looks of minecraft pocket edition games and its amazing. Without using mc cheats or hacks you can explore world & change looks of mobs & skins with our addons for mcpe.

With Addons/Mods for Mincraft PE app you can install lots of mods and add-ons for Minecraft PE. With Addons and Mods for Mincraft PE you don't need any minecraft pe launchers to applying them.

Using Add-Ons, you can transform the worlds, and modify the mob behaviors and properties, essentially creating new kind of games. You can change the look of mobs as you would with skins, and create brand new worlds as with mods, but without any hacks required.
We have gathered additionaly the most popular addons and mods here, e.g. dragons mod, vehicles, weapon, addon/mod, guns mods, cars, TNT, furniture mod and more! 

Please Check your mcpe version because every mod and addon depends on mcpe version you have, most of this mods require specific version !

DISCLAIMER: Mutant & Zombie mod is an unofficial application for Minecraft PE. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. All rights reserved. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines .
